application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Front Garden (Front Boundary) T1: Crab apple tree - Reduce height by 1 metre, remove x1 dead branch height 5m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 4m & spread to 3.5m(Left Boundary) T2: Cherry tree - Reduce height by 0.5 metre, remove x1 limb rubbing on wall height 4m & spread 1.5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 1.5mBack Garden (Left Boundary) T3: Mimosa tree - Reduce height by 1 metre, trim to shape  height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5mT5: Bay tree - Trim to shapeheight 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2.8m & spread to 2.8mT6: Grandiflora tree - Reduce height by 1.5 metres, reduce sides by 0.5 metre to balance canopy and maintain an even shape height 5m & spread 3.5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 3mT7: Variegated holly tree - Trim tight to shape (garden side only)height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 3.9m & spread to 2.9m(Centre) T8: Yew tree x2 - Trim to shapeheight 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2.8m & spread to 2.8m(Right Boundary) T9: Apple - Remove dead section and x1 limb  height 3m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2.5m & spread to 2mT10: Bay tree - Reduce height by 4 metres, thin out by 5%, reduce sides to by 1m balance canopy and maintain an even shape height 7m & spread 4.5m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 3.5mT11: Ivy - Remove from wall on right-hand sideheight 2.5m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 0m & spread to 0m  Reason for work: General tree maintenance, clearance from building, overhanging road
